#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
int main()
{
    int m,n,p,i,x,y,j;
    cin>>m>>n>>p;
    long long dp[m+1][n+1];
    memset(dp, 0, sizeof(dp));
    for(i=1;i<=p;i++){
            cin>>x>>y;
        dp[x][y]=-1;
    }
    if(dp[1][1]==-1)
    {
        cout<<"0"<<endl;
        return 0;
    }

    for(j=1;j<=n;j++){
            if(dp[1][j]!=-1)
                dp[1][j]=1LL;
            else
                break;

    }
    for(i=1;i<=m;i++){
        if(dp[i][1]!=-1)
                dp[i][1]=1LL;
            else
                break;
    }
    for(i=2;i<=m;i++)
    {
        for(j=2;j<=n;j++)
        {
            if(dp[i][j]==-1)
                continue;
            if(dp[i-1][j]>0)
            dp[i][j]=(dp[i][j]+dp[i-1][j])%MOD;
            if(dp[i][j-1]>0)
            dp[i][j]=(dp[i][j]+dp[i][j-1])%MOD;
        }
    }
    cout<<max(dp[m][n],0LL)<<endl;

    return 0;
}
